interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: JulyQueen 165g Crochet Braiding Hair Blonde Color Crochet Hair for Black Women Synthetic Hair Extension Fold Length 41 Inch 3 Pack Review Date: 2020/07/29 Store: JulyQueen Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Item model number': '165Ycl-543'} Review Text: I ordered these JulyQueen 3 packs of Jumbo Kanekalon synthetic hair extensions for one of our daughters, and she says that she likes them a lot. Our daughter says that she likes the blonde color, the braiding style, and the long texture. She says that she likes that the hair is soft to touch, smooth, thick and full, and she likes that they are 24 inches long as she wanted the hair. Our daughter says that she wanted to try a different hair style and she used these hair extensions for her Sengalese twist and she says that she used 6 packs in total to complete the style as she has 3 packs of different colors and she decided to combine the Blonde and Rose Red colors with a little left over. She says she likes that the hair extensions were easy to install and braid and she says that she likes the look, the styling of the twist and she likes that the hair extensions seem to be made with good quality 100% Kanekalon synthetic fiber, and they appear to be comfortable on her hair, lightweight, tangle- free and durable.
Our daughter says that so far so good with the Senagalese twists and she says she likes how gorgeous they look on her. For the quality, quantity and price point, they seem to be good value for money. I would recommend them. Review Title: Easy to install, soft and durable! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Lihui Pre-Twisted Passion Twist Crochet Hair 6 Packs Pre-Looped Crochet Hair For Women 14inch Passion Twist Hair Crochet Braids Hair(14Inch,#1B) Lihui {'Brand': 'Lihui', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '9.6 x 6.2 x 2.4 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '755101858097'} I ordered these Lihui Pre- Twisted Passion twists crochet 6 packs hair for my wife and she likes them so much. She says they seem to be made of good quality materials and like that they are pe-twisted. My wife wanted to try out a different style so we got these crochet passion twists. She likes that they are lightweight, durable, and easy to install with simple to follow instructions. She says she likes that the twists are tight and bouncy and they are also soft and shiny. Another feature my wife likes is that the passion twists don't tangle easily as she since she fixed them. She likes that they comes with enough twists for her whole head, and even had extra after fixing the hair. My wife has ordered hair in the past that smelled bad, luckily these twists didn't have a foul odor. Overall, my wife was very happy with these twists and how beautiful they looked on her. I would recommend them. Easy to install, and good value for money STYLEAGAL False Eyelashes - 4 Pairs Multipack Natural 3D False Eyelashes Natural Thick Hand-Made Faux Mink Eyelashes Extension(G106) styleagal {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 3.8 x 0.3 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I ordered these STYLEAGAL false eyelashes for my wife and she says she likes them so much and the thickness and the color. She says the eyelashes were easy to attach on her own eyelashes by following simple steps.
After applying them the lashes on, she says she likes how the false eyelashes blend well with her own natural eyelashes; giving them a more full look. She likes that they were made of good quality synthetic fibers, and they appear to be durable. She says she likes that they are lightweight, soft, and smooth. My wife likes that she can reuse them and she has reused them 6 times in the last 2+ weeks, and so far, so good.
For the quality, quantity and price, they are great value for money. I would recommend them. Great quality and value for money Pre-stretched Braiding Hair Easy Braid Professional Itch Free Synthetic Fiber Corchet Braids Yaki Texture Hair Extensions 5 packs Braid Hair 22 Inch (Color T1B/27) Kapelli Hair {'Brand': 'Kapelli Hair', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Package Dimensions': '11.9 x 11.25 x 2.3 inches; 15.2 Ounces'} I ordered these Kapelli Hair textured crochet extensions for my wife and she does look really good with them. My wife says that she says she does like them a lot because they are different from the crochet hair extensions that she usually gets and she likes how lightweight, abundant and flowy they feel on her head. She likes how they have a very natural and fluffy look and how easy they are to fic with no harm or damage to her skin. My wife does like the hair pattern and she says that they are nice and smooth. She says that they didn't even look frizzy or damaged when the hair was taken out of the packets. She says her favorite thing about these hair's is how easy they are to wash and how breathable it feels which makes it nice for when it’s hot in our neck of the woods Summer weather. My wife does like that the hair looks tangle -free and sheds- free after washing them. Overall my wife really likes the hair extension and she says that they are different, cute and they look natural and shiny. I would definitely recommend them. Durable, easy to fix and great value for money! JulyQueen 165g Crochet Braiding Hair Blonde Color Crochet Hair for Black Women Synthetic Hair Extension Fold Length 41 Inch 3 Pack JulyQueen {'Item model number': '165Ycl-543'} I ordered these JulyQueen 3 packs of Jumbo Kanekalon synthetic hair extensions for one of our daughters, and she says that she likes them a lot. Our daughter says that she likes the blonde color, the braiding style, and the long texture. She says that she likes that the hair is soft to touch, smooth, thick and full, and she likes that they are 24 inches long as she wanted the hair. Our daughter says that she wanted to try a different hair style and she used these hair extensions for her Sengalese twist and she says that she used 6 packs in total to complete the style as she has 3 packs of different colors and she decided to combine the Blonde and Rose Red colors with a little left over. She says she likes that the hair extensions were easy to install and braid and she says that she likes the look, the styling of the twist and she likes that the hair extensions seem to be made with good quality 100% Kanekalon synthetic fiber, and they appear to be comfortable on her hair, lightweight, tangle- free and durable.
Our daughter says that so far so good with the Senagalese twists and she says she likes how gorgeous they look on her. For the quality, quantity and price point, they seem to be good value for money. I would recommend them. Easy to install, soft and durable!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Targeted Demographic:** Engages with beauty products for women, particularly focused on hair styling and eye enhancement, with a strong interest in grooming items.
- **Style Preference:** Enjoys versatile and innovative hairstyles, favoring lightweight, textured styles that enhance a natural look, including intricate braiding techniques.
- **Material Quality:** Highly values premium, soft, and durable materials, appreciating items crafted from quality materials like 100% Kanekalon synthetic fiber, which offer comfort and durability.
- **Installation & Ease of Use:** Prioritizes convenience, seeking user-friendly hair products that are easy to install and braid, with clear instructions for application.
- **Care & Maintenance:** Prefers low-maintenance hair solutions, evidenced by a positive experience with products that are lightweight, tangle-free, and comfortable for all-day wear, even in warmer climates.
- **Satisfaction Indicators:** Looks for softness, smoothness, and fullness in hair extensions, valuing products that provide sufficient quantity for desired styles without needing extra purchases.
- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Likely to recommend well-performing products based on personal experiences, particularly those demonstrating quality, ease of installation, and aesthetic appeal.
- **Value for Money:** Seeks good value, emphasizing quality at an affordable price, gravitating towards items that combine durability with versatility in both hair and beauty applications.

Overall, the user appreciates high-quality, user-friendly beauty products that enhance aesthetics while ensuring ease of maintenance and stylish versatility.
